title: Biscuit Basket
mission_objective: Have 0 biscuits on this gear: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.02

rules.text: SPI + [connect]: Give [2] a biscuit to move 1 biscuit to a human that does not have a biscuit on them and add 4[progress] to them.
AWA + [reason]: Sneak a biscuit to soothe 3 fatigue and move 1 biscuit to your role.

title: Journey
description: You have to venture to a different location for the next step in your journey.
mission_objective: Arrive at the attached location: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.50

title: Helping Hand
description: You have agreed to help this person with a task around the Valley.

rules.text: Do not add this mission to the campaign tracker. If you do not help this person before the end of the day, the opportunity is lost for now.
The attached being gains Persistent.

title: Biscuit Delivery
description: Continuing a time-honored Ranger tradition, Calypsa has tasked you with delivering biscuits to the people of White Sky as your first mission. Find Hy Pimpot at Lone Tree Station. He'll give you the biscuits and send you on your way.
mission_objective: Travel away from Lone Tree Station while Hy Pimpot is in play: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.01

rules.text: During this mission, use [Campaign Log Entry] 91 instead of the normal entries for Hy Pimpot, Kordo, Nal, and Quisi Vos.
If Quisi Vos is not in the path discard, she is drawn by baked goods. »» Search the Valley set for Quisi and put her into play.

title: Accommodation
description: You've agreed to help Spirit Speaker Nal investigate the Caustic Mulcher's purpose in the ecosystem. Explore the woodlands of the Valley, where Caustic Mulchers can be found.
mission_objective: Have all [Ranger Tokens] on this card: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.40

rules.text: When a [Ranger Token] is removed from a Caustic Mulcher, place it on this card. It cannot be moved from here by the Mulcher's effects.

At any point, the group can choose to change their mind and help Kordo instead. If they do, remove all [Ranger Tokens] from this card and flip it into Intervention. Replace Accommodation with Intervention on the campaign tracker.

title: Rising Waters
description: Torrential rains are causing floods.
mission_objective: Have 3[progress] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.07

rules.text: Use [Campaign Log Entry] 1.05 instead of the normal entries for these locations.
When a card with a Flood attached is cleared, place 1[progress] on this mission and shuffle the Flood into the path deck.
Add 1 token to the weather.

title: Sensor Network
description: Deploy sensors to try to detect Reclaimers.
mission_objective: Have 3[progress] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.09

rules.text: When a feature comes into play at one of these locations, you may attach this mission to it.
When a feature with this mission attached is cleared, place 1[progress] on this mission.
If this mission is attached, exhaust a non-human being. »» Unattach this mission unless a ranger spends 1 FOC energy.

title: Trail of Vines
description: You might be able to track the mysterious Verdessian through its effects on local flora.
mission_objective: Have 2R or more vine tokens on this card: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.11

rules.text: When a flora comes into play, place 1 vine token on it.
When a card with vine tokens on it is cleared, move those tokens here.
It must have come this way. Move 1 vine token from a flora to another flora.
A residual energy causes the plant to grow rapidly. Add 1 vine token to a flora.
Did those plants just... nip at you?! Each ranger suffers fatigue equal to the number of vine tokens within reach.

title: Find the Nest
description: To study the Reclaimers you will first have to track one of the creatures back to their nest. Since you can't keep up with them on foot, you will have to tag them with sap and let Gus the mole sniff out the trail for you.

rules.text: FOC + [reason]: Affix [2] a tracking sap to a Reclaimer to attach this mission card to a Reclaimer Seeker in play.
Discard an active Reclaimer Seeker. If this mission is attached to it, Gus follows the tagged creature. »» [Campaign Log Entry] 1.15

title: Remove the Reclaimers
description: Search the Valley for options on how to deal with the mounting reclaimer invasion before it overwhelms the Valley.

rules.text: There are three different options to discover. Talk with people around the Valley who you think might have ideas for how to find them.

title: Lost Brother
description: Aell fled into the southern swamps. If you can find him, perhaps you can get him to create another flood.
mission_objective: Use [Campaign Log Entry] 1.19 instead of the normal entries for Aell, Ambitious Shaper.

rules.text: Find a way to travel to the Marsh of Rebirth and locate Aell.

title: Worm Food
description: Set up lures around the swamp.
mission_objective: Have 2[progress] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.24

rules.text: When a feature comes into play at one of these locations, you may attach this mission to it.
When feature with this mission attached is cleared, add 1[progress] to this mission.
If this mission is attached, exhaust a non-human being. »» Unattach this mission unless a ranger spends 1 FOC energy.

title: Invasion - Stage I
description: The strange biomelds known as 'reclaimers' are swarming over the Valley. More appear each day.

rules.text: Path Deck Assembly: Based on the number of days since you received this mission, check whether your destination has a trait that matches a listed trait. If it does, search the General set for 3 Reclaimer Seekers and shuffle them into the path deck. 0-2 Days: Ruin. 3-4 Days: Ruin, Forest. 5-6 Days: Ruin, Forest, Mountain

title: Spire Under Attack!
description: A horde of reclaimers is moving towards Spire! You'll have to get there right away to help with the evacuation.
mission_objective: Arrive at Spire: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.29

rules.text: End of the Day: Check off one bubble next to this mission.
Suffer 1 fatigue.

title: Lure
description: Locate one of the local mega-predators by finding prey to lure it out.
mission_objective: Arrive at a new location while there is 5 or more total presence of prey set aside: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.42

rules.text: When a prey is cleared, you can set it aside instead of discarding it.
If there are 2 active predators and at least 1 set-aside prey, exhaust them. »» Return 1 set-aside prey to the collection.

title: Search
description: You are following the trail of a missing local.
mission_objective: Have 4R or more trail tokens on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.45

rules.text: If your current location is not a Ranger Station, when a feature comes into play, place 2 trail tokens on it.
When a card with trail tokens on it is cleared, place those tokens on this card.
They must have come this way. Move 1 trail token from a feature to another feature.
The trail grows cold. Remove 1 trail token from a feature.
The urgency of the task weighs on you. Suffer 1 fatigue.

title: Arcology Archaeology
description: Silaro Mako has asked you to keep an eye out for remnants of the old arcology for him.
mission_objective: After this mission has 3 check marks, find Silaro Mako to continue.

rules.text: After a ruin is cleared: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.49

title: Invasion - Stage II
description: The reclaimers are everywhere. They seem to be creating nests in certain locations.

rules.text: Path Deck Assembly: If your destination is a Ruin, Forest, or Mountain, search the General set for 1 Reclaimer Polyp and shuffle it into the path deck. Additionally, shuffle in a number of Reclaimer Seekers based on the number of days since you received this mission. 0-2 Days: 1 Reclaimer Seeker. 3-4 Days: 2 Reclaimer Seekers. 5-6 Days: 3 Reclaimer Seekers

title: The Fall of Spire
description: The Reclaimers are swarming into Spire! Get as many people to safety as possible.
mission_objective: Save the groups being led by Mora, Dace, and Tollin. Then, travel away from Spire: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.30

rules.text: End of the Day: If you haven't completed this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.31
Use [Campaign Log Entry] 93 instead of the normal entries for cards from the Spire set.
Add 1 mucus token to the location. If there is 3 or more mucus, discard them. »» Put a Reclaimer Polyp into play.
Add [harm] to a feature equal to Reclaimers in play. If this clears the feature, a wall collapses. »» Each Ranger suffers 3 fatigue.

title: Confront
description: You've found the mega-predator! Now it's time to deal with it once and for all.

rules.text: When the subject of this mission is cleared, resolve the following effects instead:
Clear [harm]: Permanently kill the majestic mega-predator [Campaign Log Entry] 1.44
Clear [progress]: Befriend and calm the beast so it is no longer an issue [Campaign Log Entry] 1.43
If the predator has 2R or more [progress], resolve its [crest] effect.
If the predator has 3R or more [harm], move it.

title: Rescue
description: You've found the missing person! Get them back to the safety of a Ranger Station as quickly as possible.
mission_objective: Arrive at a Ranger Station: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.46

rules.text: Start of the Day: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.47
The subject of this mission gains Persistent.
When the subject of this mission is cleared, resolve the following effects instead:
Clear [harm]: They worsen and you will have to carry them going forward. [Campaign Log Entry] 1.48
Clear [progress]: Discard all [progress] from this being. They remain in play. Do not read their entry.
If there is no active predator. »» Search the path deck and discard for the next predator and put it into play.

title: Intervention
description: You've agreed to help Kordo remove the unnatural biomeld Caustic Mulcher from the ecosystem. Explore the woodlands of the Valley, where Caustic Mulchers can be found.
mission_objective: Clear a Caustic Mulcher with [harm]: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.41

rules.text: At any point, the group can choose to change their mind and help Nal instead. If they do, flip this card into Accomodation. Replace Intervention with Accommodation on the campaign tracker.

title: Watcher in the Brush
description: You have felt a lurking presence following you since your discovery of the strange biomeld corpses. It generally stays out of sight, so you are going to have to confront it to figure out what it wants.
mission_objective: Clear the Mysterious Verdessian with [progress]

rules.text: Path Deck Assembly: Add the Mysterious Verdessian to the path deck.

title: Secret Invasion
description: Search for signs of reclaimers to figure out how many are present in the Valley.
mission_objective: Clear a Reclaimer Seeker: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.10

rules.text: Path Deck Assembly: At any non-pivotal location, search the General set for 5 Reclaimer Seekers and shuffle them into the Valley set before adding those cards to the path deck.
AWA + [exploration]: Search for signs of these strange biomelds to scout a number of path cards equal to twice your effort. Put each Reclaimer card you look at into play.

title: Deeper Motives
description: Help Nal commune with the Verdessian.

rules.text: Use [Campaign Log Entry] 92 instead of the normal entries for this location and for Spirit Speaker Nal and the Mysterious Verdessian while at this location.
If Nal and the Mysterious Verdessian are in play and ready, Nal gets through to them. »» [Campaign Log Entry] 1.12
If Nal and the Mysterious Verdessian are in play, the Verdessian tries to flee. »» Exhaust Nal unless a ranger suffers 2 fatigue.

title: Into the Nest
description: Travel into the reclaimer nest to study what they are doing in the Valley.
mission_objective: Have 3[progress] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.17

rules.text: Use [Campaign Log Entry] 1.16 instead of the normal entries for this location.
When a Reclaimer Grub is cleared while at the Alluvial Ruins, place 1[progress] on this mission.

title: The Valley's Secrets
description: With the reclaimers gone from the Valley, you can return to helping the inhabitants.

rules.text:
When each of the following entries are written on your campaign tracker: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.33
• Met an Interloper
• Spoke With a Spirit
• Found the Perfect Fishing Spot
• Proved Silaro's Hypothesis
• Seen a Person Fly
• Erected a Mighty Statue
• Discovered the Philosopher's Honey
• Carved a Dolewood Canoe
• Celebrated the Harvest Festival
• Faced Your Deepest Fears
• Pruned the Hydraworm
• Witnessed a Masterpiece
• Found Tala a Home

title: Washed Away
description: Wash away the reclaimers with Aell's flood.
mission_objective: Have 2+R [progress] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.23

rules.text: When a Reclaimer is discarded by a Flood, do not suffer fatigue. Instead, add 1[progress] to this card.
End of the Day: If you haven't completed this mission [Campaign Log Entry] 1.22
If Aell is active, he summons a torrent of water. »» Add 1 flood token to a card of your choice.
If there are no active Reclaimers. »» Search the path deck and discard for the next Reclaimer and put it into play.

title: Gruesome Feast
description: Wait until you're certain enough Reclaimers have been lured, and then escape!
mission_objective: Travel away while this mission is attached to the location: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.27

rules.text: When there are 2+R Reclaimers in play, attach this mission to the location.

FOC + [reason]: Lure Reclaimers deeper into the swamp to scout path cards equal to twice your effort. Put each Reclaimer card you look at into play. If they have the ambush keyword, treat them as if they do not.
End of the Day: If you haven't completed this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.28
